description: This subsystem acts as the central control and coordination hub for the entire CodeBoarding application. It manages the lifecycle of analysis jobs, interacts with the job database, handles repository operations, orchestrates the analysis and documentation generation pipeline, and provides the main entry points for both local and CI/CD environments. It is responsible for initiating analysis, managing its state, and generating final documentation outputs.

components.name: main.main
components.description: Serves as the primary entry point for the application, orchestrating the overall code analysis and documentation generation pipeline. It initiates analysis, manages its state, and coordinates the generation of final documentation outputs.

components.name: local_app.LocalApp
components.description: Provides the local application interface for managing analysis and documentation generation jobs. It handles job initiation, status tracking, and concurrent execution within a local development environment.

components.name: github_action.GithubAction
components.description: Serves as the primary interface for CI/CD workflows, specifically GitHub Actions. It is responsible for parsing inputs, validating configurations, and triggering analysis and documentation generation processes within an automated environment.

components.name: duckdb_crud.DuckDBCrud
components.description: Manages the lifecycle of analysis and documentation generation jobs, including initiation, status tracking, and concurrent execution. It provides persistent storage for job metadata, status updates, and results using DuckDB.

components.name: diagram_analysis.diagram_generator.DiagramGenerator
components.description: Transforms structured analysis data into various diagram formats. It is responsible for generating comprehensive visualizations, which are a key output of the documentation process.
